DocLocalization.Name: Definiert durch Vorlage - Relation
DocLocalization.Documentation: Relation zwischen einem Merkmal und dessen Definition / Schablone

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedPropertySets
DocAttribute.Documentation: One or many property sets or quantity sets that obtain their definitions from the single property set template.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingTemplate
DocAttribute.Documentation: Property set template that provides the common definition of related property sets.
